snippet.title: Little Cities | Sandbox Update Trailer | Meta Quest VR
snippet.description:
Get a closer look at the upcoming Sandbox Update, launching on June 29th, the latest free update for Little Cities. Craft the islands of your dreams from scratch, limited only by your own imagination!

Fully customize (or randomize!) your experience with a landscape editor, fresh Attractions, ruins, and lots more… 

Get ready for endless cozy creativity, only on Meta Quest VR.
----
💙 Buy Now - https://www.oculus.com/experiences/quest/4988470131168299
----
🏗️Developed by @purpleyonder1034 
🧰Published by @nDreamsVR 
----
👍 Subscribe -  @nDreamsVR 
----
💻 Learn More - http://ndreams.com/games/little-cities
----
🐦 Twitter - https://twitter.com/nDreams

#VR #Quest2
